languages.text: "Я понимаю твое горе и смятение. Твои родители погибли, это нелегко перенести. Но они отдали жизни за правду, за благо всего корабля, за Империум. Не говори об их достойной участи с гневом и презрением".

traits.locale_text: "Я понимаю твое горе и смятение. Твои родители погибли, это нелегко перенести. Но они отдали жизни за правду, за благо всего корабля, за Империум. Не говори об их достойной участи с гневом и презрением".

languages.text: "I understand your grief and dismay. Your parents died. It's not an easy thing to go through. But they gave their lives for the truth, for the good of the whole ship, for the Imperium. Do not speak of their honourable fate with anger and disdain."
languages.original_text: "Я понимаю твое горе и смятение. Твои родители погибли, это нелегко перенести. Но они отдали жизни за правду, за благо всего корабля, за Империум. Не говори об их достойной участи с гневом и презрением".

traits.locale_text: "I understand your grief and dismay. Your parents died. It's not an easy thing to go through. But they gave their lives for the truth, for the good of the whole ship, for the Imperium. Do not speak of their honorable fate with anger and disdain."

"I understand your grief and dismay. Your parents died. It's not an easy thing to go through. But they gave their lives for the truth, for the good of the whole ship, for the Imperium. Do not speak of their honorable fate with anger and disdain."

"I understand your grief and dismay. Your parents died. It's not an easy thing to go through. But they gave their lives for the truth, for the good of the whole ship, for the Imperium. Do not speak of their honourable fate with anger and disdain."

languages.text: “我能理解你们的悲痛与失落。你们的父母去世了，这件事情确实很让人难以接受。但他们为了真理，为了全船人的利益，为了帝国献出了自己的生命。不要以愤怒与蔑视的态度谈论他们的光荣之举。”
languages.original_text: "I understand your grief and dismay. Your parents died. It's not an easy thing to go through. But they gave their lives for the truth, for the good of the whole ship, for the Imperium. Do not speak of their honourable fate with anger and disdain."

traits.locale_text: “我能理解你们的悲痛与失落。你们的父母去世了，这件事情确实很让人难以接受。但他们为了真理，为了全船人的利益，为了帝国献出了自己的生命。不要以愤怒与蔑视的态度谈论他们的光荣之举。”

languages.text: «Entiendo vuestro dolor, vuestro pesar. Vuestros padres han muerto. No es fácil superarlo. Pero dieron sus vidas por la verdad, por el bien de la nave y por el Imperium. No habléis con desdén y furia de su honroso destino».
languages.original_text: "I understand your grief and dismay. Your parents died. It's not an easy thing to go through. But they gave their lives for the truth, for the good of the whole ship, for the Imperium. Do not speak of their honourable fate with anger and disdain."

traits.locale_text: «Entiendo vuestro dolor, vuestro pesar. Vuestros padres han muerto. No es fácil superarlo. Pero dieron sus vidas por la verdad, por el bien de la nave y por el Imperium. No habléis con desdén y furia de su honroso destino».

languages.text: 「君の悲しみと落胆はよくわかる。両親が亡くなったのだ。簡単に受け入れられることではないだろう。しかし、彼らは真実のため、船全体のため、帝国のために命を捧げたのだ。彼らの名誉ある運命を、怒りや軽蔑で語ってはならない」
languages.original_text: "I understand your grief and dismay. Your parents died. It's not an easy thing to go through. But they gave their lives for the truth, for the good of the whole ship, for the Imperium. Do not speak of their honourable fate with anger and disdain."

traits.locale_text: 「君の悲しみと落胆はよくわかる。両親が亡くなったのだ。簡単に受け入れられることではないだろう。しかし、彼らは真実のため、船全体のため、帝国のために命を捧げたのだ。彼らの名誉ある運命を、怒りや軽蔑で語ってはならない」

languages.text: "Ich verstehe eure Trauer und Betroffenheit. Eure Eltern sind gestorben. Das durchzumachen, ist nicht leicht. Aber sie haben ihr Leben für die Wahrheit gegeben, für das Wohl des gesamten Schiffs, für das Imperium. Sprecht nicht mit Wut und Abneigung von ihrem ehrenhaften Schicksal."
languages.original_text: "I understand your grief and dismay. Your parents died. It's not an easy thing to go through. But they gave their lives for the truth, for the good of the whole ship, for the Imperium. Do not speak of their honourable fate with anger and disdain."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe eure Trauer und Betroffenheit. Eure Eltern sind gestorben. Das durchzumachen, ist nicht leicht. Aber sie haben ihr Leben für die Wahrheit gegeben, für das Wohl des gesamten Schiffs, für das Imperium. Sprecht nicht mit Wut und Abneigung von ihrem ehrenhaften Schicksal."

languages.text: « Je comprends ton chagrin et ton désarroi. Tu as perdu tes parents, c'est quelque chose de très difficile à vivre. Mais ils ont donné leur vie pour la vérité, pour le bien du vaisseau entier, pour l'Imperium. Ne parle pas de leur mort honorable avec colère et dédain. »
languages.original_text: "I understand your grief and dismay. Your parents died. It's not an easy thing to go through. But they gave their lives for the truth, for the good of the whole ship, for the Imperium. Do not speak of their honourable fate with anger and disdain."

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends ton chagrin et ton désarroi. Tu as perdu tes parents, c'est quelque chose de très difficile à vivre. Mais ils ont donné leur vie pour la vérité, pour le bien du vaisseau entier, pour l'Imperium. Ne parle pas de leur mort honorable avec colère et dédain. »

languages.text: "Kederinizi ve umursamazlığınızı anlıyorum. Ailenizi yitirdiniz. Bu, kolayca atlatılabilecek bir olay değil. Ancak ebeveynleriniz bir hiç uğruna ölmedi. Hakikat için savaştılar, bu geminin iyiliği ve İmparatorluk'un refahı uğruna can verdiler. Saygıdeğer kaderlerini hiddetle anıp hor görmeyin."
languages.original_text: "I understand your grief and dismay. Your parents died. It's not an easy thing to go through. But they gave their lives for the truth, for the good of the whole ship, for the Imperium. Do not speak of their honourable fate with anger and disdain."

traits.locale_text: "Kederinizi ve umursamazlığınızı anlıyorum. Ailenizi yitirdiniz. Bu, kolayca atlatılabilecek bir olay değil. Ancak ebeveynleriniz, hiç uğruna ölmedi. Hakikat için savaştılar, bu geminin iyiliği ve İmparatorluk'un refahı uğruna can verdiler. Saygıdeğer kaderlerini, hiddetle anıp hor görmenizi istemiyorum."
